response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? ich dachte, wir hätten already 2018! #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? i thought we had already reached 2018! #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the fact that many companies still collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy, despite the growing awareness and importance of data protection and privacy in today's digital age. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security (security) are used to reach a wider audience and connect with others who share similar concerns.
